entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
